sentences.cn: 现在还不能把录音抹去.

sentences.en: He tried to erase the idea from his mind.
sentences.cn: 他试图从头脑中抹掉这个想法.

sentences.en: I could not erase from my mind the poignant thought.
sentences.cn: 我无法驱散萦绕在我心头的痛切之感.

sentences.en: I shall try never to erase the boundaries that separate the two domains.
sentences.cn: 我们也将力求不抹杀这两上领域的界限.

sentences.en: In cell wars, as in other wars, the battle scars are often difficult to erase.
sentences.cn: 在细胞战争中就象在其他战争中一样, 战争的创伤常常是不容易去除的.

sentences.en: Make light pencil lines so that they will erase easily.
sentences.cn: 划铅笔线要浅些,便于擦掉.

sentences.en: Most of our fears are unreasonable, but they are impossible to erase.
sentences.cn: 我们的恐惧多半是毫无根据的, 可却又无法消除.

sentences.en: Please erase my name from the list.
sentences.cn: 请把我的名字从名单上擦去.

sentences.en: She couldn't erase the terrible experience from her memory.
sentences.cn: 她无法把那次可怕的经历从记忆中抹去.

sentences.en: She tried to erase the memory of that evening.
sentences.cn: 她试图忘却那天晚上的事。

sentences.en: Some of the names had been accidentally erased.
sentences.cn: 有几个名字无意中被擦掉了。

sentences.en: The computer crashed, and all our records were erased.
sentences.cn: 计算机瘫痪了，我们所有的记录都被删除了。

sentences.en: These marks don't erase easily, I'm afraid.
sentences.cn: 这些记号恐怕不容易擦掉.

sentences.en: They are desperate to erase the memory of that last defeat in Cardiff.
sentences.cn: 他们急于抹去上次在卡迪夫遭遇失败的记忆。

sentences.en: Try as I might , I cannot erase such a terrible experience from my mind.
sentences.cn: 我怎么也不能把这可怕的经历从我的记忆中抹掉.

sentences.en: Why would they erase my memory of you?
sentences.cn: 他们为什么要擦除关于你的记忆?

sentences.en: You can erase pencil marks with a rubber.
sentences.cn: 你可以用橡皮擦掉铅笔记号.

words.tran_cn: 可消除的；可抹去的；可删除的
